Articles.Content: hey everyone, I do streaming on twitch for a number of games including KSP and I was thinking... Is it possible to have a plugin to rename the kerbals after my twitch followers? if it already exists could somebody point it out please? If not would anybody be able to make one? If anyone could make one that would be stable with my game (mod list on the channel, see sig for link) I would be extremely grateful!

This might accomplish what you want: [Moderator removed defunct website link]

If you wanted it to automatically fetch your list of followers and place them in game automatically, that would be possible, but someone would have to write a custom plugin.

Edited August 28, 2022 by James Kerman
link removed

Thanks for the info guys, its a great start! I wonder if anybody wants to write a custom plugin for me and get your name on the hall of fame on my channel? I would write one myself but im not a coder :/
